metadata.synopsis: Patron, Buff Tanner, dialogue at Elfsong Tavern. Speaks about the refugees.

0.speaker: Buff Tanner
0.text: Hells, I didn't drive them refugees out of their homes, the Absolute did that. It's not my responsibility to get them new homes. We got our own people to look after.

1.speaker: Buff Tanner
1.text: I been thinking about it - I feel bad about all them refugees, but we just can't let them flood into the city. We'd be overwhelmed. In fact, that's probably the Absolute army's plan.
